h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the First Bell
content: With Guangzhi defeated, you can look where he was meditating to find a large bell. Interact with the pole to ring the bell. The Keeper will fret over this, but in reality this is the first of three bells you should seek out in Chapter 1 to uncover a major secret!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangzhi.md', within the main section titled 'Guangzhi', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the First Bell'.
The content is as follows:
With Guangzhi defeated, you can look where he was meditating to find a large bell. Interact with the pole to ring the bell. The Keeper will fret over this, but in reality this is the first of three bells you should seek out in Chapter 1 to uncover a major secret!
